title: Understanding the Augusta Rule: How Tyler Made $28,000 from Rental Income
subtitle: Discover how Tyler leveraged the Augusta Rule to legally claim rental income and ensure he owes nothing in taxes. Learn the benefits and strategies you can apply in your own rental income scenarios.
content:
Tyler? Yep.

Looks like you made $28,000 from your rental income this year?

Yep.

So you owe us?

Nothing.

Nobody owes us nothing.

$14,000 of that was from our renting out our home in Malibu for two weeks. Augusta Rule.

Well, you owe us on the other $14,000.

Oh, no. I actually claimed that original $14,000 as a business expense because I rented out my home in Malibu to my business for our office parties.

Two weeks of office parties? A tradition like no other. Or traditions.
